title: SAMSUNG GALAXY S24 ULTRA 5G 6.8", 200+50+10+12/12MP, 12/512GB 5000MAH, TITANIUM YELLOW
description:
Мобилен телефон
Android 14, One UI 6.1
Glass front (Gorilla Glass Victus 3), glass back (Gorilla Glass Victus 3), aluminum frame
Екран 6.8" (1440x3088) Dynamic LTPO AMOLED 2X, 120Hz, HDR10+, 2600 nits (peak)
Chipset:Qualcomm SM8650-AC Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 (4 nm)
CPU:Octa-core (1x3.3 GHz Cortex-X4 & 5x3.2 GHz Cortex-A720 & 2x2.3 GHz Cortex-A520)
GPU:Adreno 750 (1 GHz)
IP68 водоотпорeн (1.5m за 30 мин)
Интерна меморија:512GB,RAM 12GB
Примарна камера:
200 MP, f/1.7, 24mm (wide), 1/1.3", 0.6µm, multi-directional PDAF, Laser AF, OIS
50 MP, (periscope telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 5x optical zoom
10 MP, f/2.4, 70mm (telephoto), 1/3.52", 1.12µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
12 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120? (ultrawide), 1/2.55", 1.4µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, Super Steady video
Секундарна камера:
12 MP, f/2.2, 26mm (wide), Dual Pixel PDAF
Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6e/7, tri-band, Wi-Fi Direct
Bluetooth: 5.3, A2DP, LE
GPS, GLONASS, BDS, GALILEO
NFC
USB Type-C 3.2, OTG
Fast charging:
45W wired, PD3.0, 65% in 30 min (advertised)
15W wireless (Qi/PMA)
4.5W reverse wireless
Батерија:Li-Ion 5000mAh
